name: XRPose.transform
description: The transform read-only attribute of the XRPose interface is a XRRigidTransform object providing the position and orientation of the pose relative to the base XRSpace as specified when the pose was obtained by calling XRFrame.getPose().

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRPose.transform' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
